data.question: What is the formula of the metalloporphyrinic framework platform reported?
What are the synthesis conditions for CZJ-18(M)?
data.answer: Heating a mixture of M-H8L and Y(NO3)3·6 H2O in a mixed solvent of DMF and acetic acid at 80-88°C for one week.

data.question: What is the pore dimension of the CZJ-18(M) frameworks?
What is the role of acetate in the CZJ-18(M) frameworks?
data.answer: Acetate acts as an h4-ligand to bridge firmly three YIII ions, stabilizing and neutralizing the framework structures.

data.question: How does CZJ-18(Cu)-Cu improve catalytic activity in aerobic oxidation of alcohols?
data.answer: By suspending redox-active CuII ions in the anionic pores, eliminating ligation of counter ions to the active sites.

data.question: What is the BET surface area of CZJ-18(Cu)?
True or False: CZJ-18(Mn) is superior to its homogeneous molecular counterpart in terms of substrate conversion and epoxide product selectivity.
True or False: CZJ-18(Cu)-Cu can be reused for six cycles with almost retained high catalytic efficiency.
What is the yield of the aldol addition reaction catalyzed by CZJ-18(Cu)-Pro between cyclohexanone and 4-nitrobenzaldehyde?
True or False: CZJ-18(Zn)-Cu is inactive in aerobic oxidation reactions under visible light.
What is the maximum photo-generated current response value of CZJ-18(Zn)-Cu/FTO electrode?
True or False: The photocatalytic properties of CZJ-18(Zn)-Cu can be improved by adding 2,2’-bipyridine.
What is the diastereomeric ratio (dr) and enantiomeric excess (ee) for the aldol addition reaction catalyzed by CZJ-18(Cu)-Pro?
data.answer: dr of 5:1 and 88% ee for the anti isomer

data.question: True or False: CZJ-18(Cu)-Cu selectively accumulates substrate over product molecules.
What is the role of ZnII-porphyrins in CZJ-18(Zn)-Cu during photocatalysis?
data.answer: They act as efficient photosensitizers to absorb visible light for the activation of O2 oxidant.

data.question: True or False: CZJ-18(Cu)-Cu has a lower BET surface area compared to CZJ-18(Cu)-SB.
How does the incorporation of molecular bioinspired catalysts into the platform affect catalytic efficiency and stability?
data.answer: It significantly improves the catalytic efficiency and stability.

data.question: True or False: The photocurrent density of a blank FTO electrode is comparable to that of CZJ-18(Zn)-Cu/FTO.
What is the effect of incorporating different functional moieties into CZJ-18(M) on its catalytic properties?
data.answer: It tunes the catalytic properties by in situ assembly strategy.

data.question: What is the significance of the metalloporphyrinic framework platform reported in the study?
data.answer: It is systematically tunable with different functional moieties for highly efficient bioinspired, photocatalysis, and asymmetric catalysis.
